intents.name: greeting
intents.description: Recognizes when the user greets the virtual assistant
examples: Hello!
Hey, how are you?
Good morning!
Hi there!
Hey assistant!

intents.name: goodbye
intents.description: Recognizes when the user ends the conversation
examples: Goodbye!
See you later.
Bye, have a nice day!
Catch you later!
I'm out, bye!

intents.name: thank_you
intents.description: Recognizes when the user expresses gratitude
examples: Thank you!
Thanks a lot!
I appreciate your help.
Much appreciated!
Thanks, assistant!

intents.name: apology
intents.description: Recognizes when the user apologizes
examples: I'm sorry.
Oops, my bad!
I didn't mean that.
Sorry about that!
My apologies.

intents.name: affirmation
intents.description: Recognizes when the user agrees or confirms
examples: Yes!
That's correct.
I agree.
Sure!
Absolutely!

intents.name: negation
intents.description: Recognizes when the user disagrees or denies
examples: No.
I don't think so.
Not really.
No way!
I disagree.

intents.name: unknown
intents.description: Handles situations where the assistant does not understand the user's input
examples: What are you talking about?
Huh?
I don't understand.
Can you repeat that?
I have no idea what you mean.

weather.description: Intents related to weather inquiries and forecasts.

intents.name: current_weather
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about the current weather conditions.
examples: What's the weather like today?
Is it raining right now?
How's the weather in New York?
Tell me today's weather forecast.
Is it sunny outside?

intents.name: weather_forecast
intents.description: Recognizes when the user inquires about future weather conditions.
examples: What's the weather like tomorrow?
Will it rain this weekend?
Give me the 7-day forecast.
Is it going to be cold next week?
Will it snow on Christmas?

intents.name: air_quality
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about air quality levels.
examples: What’s the air quality today?
Is it safe to go outside?
How’s the pollution level in my city?
Tell me about the AQI index.
Is the air clean today?

intents.name: storm_alerts
intents.description: Recognizes when the user inquires about storm warnings or severe weather alerts.
examples: Are there any storm warnings today?
Is there a hurricane coming?
Tell me about any severe weather alerts.
Should I prepare for a thunderstorm?
Is there a tornado watch?

intents.name: humidity_levels
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about humidity levels.
examples: What’s the humidity today?
Is it very humid outside?
Tell me the humidity level right now.
How dry is the air today?
Will the humidity be high tomorrow?

intents.name: sunrise_sunset
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about sunrise and sunset times.
examples: What time does the sun rise?
When will the sun set today?
Tell me the sunrise and sunset times for tomorrow.
What’s the sunset time in New York?
Will the sunset be earlier next week?

intents.name: temperature_extremes
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about extreme temperatures.
examples: What’s the highest temperature today?
Is it the coldest day of the year?
Tell me the hottest temperature recorded this month.
Will it be freezing tonight?
How hot will it get this summer?

location.description: Intents related to navigation, directions, and location-based inquiries.

intents.name: current_location
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about their current location.
examples: Where am I?
What's my current location?
Can you tell me where I am?
Find my location.
Am I near downtown?

intents.name: directions
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for directions to a specific location.
examples: How do I get to the nearest gas station?
Give me directions to Central Park.
What's the fastest route home?
Show me the way to the airport.
Find the shortest path to my destination.

intents.name: nearby_places
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about nearby places.
examples: Where's the closest coffee shop?
Find a good restaurant near me.
Are there any ATMs nearby?
Show me nearby hotels.
Where's the nearest gas station?

intents.name: traffic_updates
intents.description: Recognizes when the user inquires about current traffic conditions.
examples: How's the traffic right now?
Is there a traffic jam on my way to work?
What's the traffic like on the highway?
Tell me about road closures.
Is there heavy traffic downtown?

intents.name: public_transport
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about public transportation options.
examples: When is the next bus?
Find the fastest subway route.
What time does the train leave?
Tell me the schedule for the metro.
Where's the nearest bus stop?

event.description: Intents related to news, headlines, and current events inquiries.

intents.name: latest_news
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for the latest news.
examples: What's the latest news?
Tell me today's headlines.
Give me the top news stories.
Any breaking news today?
Update me on current events.

intents.name: sports_news
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for sports-related news.
examples: What's the latest in sports?
Tell me the latest football scores.
Who won the game last night?
Give me updates on the NBA.
Any news about my favorite team?

intents.name: political_news
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about political news.
examples: What's happening in politics?
Tell me the latest government updates.
Any news about the election?
Give me updates on international relations.
What are the current political headlines?

intents.name: business_news
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about business and financial news.
examples: What's new in the stock market?
Tell me about the latest business trends.
How are the markets performing today?
Any major company announcements?
Give me updates on cryptocurrency.

intents.name: entertainment_news
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks about entertainment and celebrity news.
examples: What's new in Hollywood?
Tell me the latest celebrity gossip.
Any updates on upcoming movies?
Who won the Oscars this year?
What's trending in the entertainment industry?

entertainment.description: Intents related to movies, music, books, and games inquiries.

intents.name: movie_recommendation
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for movie recommendations.
examples: Can you suggest a good movie?
What are some must-watch films?
Give me a movie recommendation.
What's a popular movie right now?
Suggest a film for me.

intents.name: music_recommendation
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for music recommendations.
examples: Suggest some good songs to listen to.
What are the top songs right now?
Can you recommend a music playlist?
Tell me some trending music.
What are the best songs this week?

intents.name: book_recommendation
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for book recommendations.
examples: Can you suggest a book to read?
What are the best books right now?
Give me a book recommendation.
What's a good book for beginners?
Tell me some bestsellers.

intents.name: game_recommendation
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for video game recommendations.
examples: What are some popular video games?
Suggest a good game to play.
Any new game releases?
Tell me about the top-rated games.
Recommend a game for me.

intents.name: tv_show_recommendation
intents.description: Recognizes when the user asks for TV show recommendations.
examples: What are some trending TV shows?
Can you recommend a good series?
Tell me about the best TV shows right now.
Give me a series to watch.
What's a popular TV show these days?

organization.description: Intents related to reminders, scheduling, and task management.

intents.name: set_reminder
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to set a reminder.
examples: Remind me to call mom at 7 PM.
Set a reminder for my meeting tomorrow.
I need a reminder to buy groceries.
Can you remind me about my doctor's appointment?
Schedule a reminder for my lunch break.

intents.name: check_schedule
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to check their schedule.
examples: What's on my schedule today?
Do I have any meetings tomorrow?
Show me my agenda for next week.
Do I have any plans this evening?
What's my calendar like for this month?

intents.name: add_task
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to add a task to their to-do list.
examples: Add 'buy milk' to my to-do list.
I need to finish my report by Friday, add it to my tasks.
Create a new task: finish project proposal.
Can you add 'clean the house' to my task list?
I want to set a task for completing my homework.

intents.name: delete_task
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to remove a task from their to-do list.
examples: Remove 'buy milk' from my tasks.
Delete the task about cleaning the house.
Can you take 'finish project proposal' off my list?
I completed my homework, remove it from my tasks.
Clear my to-do list.

intents.name: set_timer
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to set a timer.
examples: Set a timer for 10 minutes.
Start a 5-minute countdown.
I need a timer for my workout session.
Can you time me for 30 minutes?
Set a timer to remind me to check the oven.

shopping.description: Intents related to online shopping, product search, and order management.

intents.name: search_product
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to search for a product online.
examples: Find me a new laptop.
Search for wireless headphones.
I need a good pair of running shoes.
Look up the best smartphones under $500.
Show me popular gaming keyboards.

intents.name: check_order_status
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to check their order status.
examples: Where is my package?
Check the delivery status of my order.
Has my phone been shipped yet?
Track my recent Amazon order.
When will my shoes arrive?

intents.name: add_to_cart
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to add an item to their cart.
examples: Add this jacket to my shopping cart.
Can you put a new phone case in my cart?
I want to buy this book, add it to my cart.
Add 2 packs of batteries to my order.
Put this coffee maker in my cart.

intents.name: remove_from_cart
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to remove an item from their cart.
examples: Take the shoes out of my cart.
Remove the wireless headphones from my order.
Delete the book from my shopping cart.
I changed my mind, remove the phone case.
Cancel the laptop order from my cart.

intents.name: apply_discount_code
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to apply a discount code.
examples: Apply this coupon code to my order.
Can I get a discount on this?
Use the promo code 'SAVE20'.
Add my loyalty discount to the checkout.
Apply a student discount if available.

recipe.description: Intents related to cooking, recipes, and dining out.

intents.name: find_recipe
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to search for a recipe.
examples: Find a recipe for chocolate cake.
How do I make lasagna?
Give me a recipe for a healthy smoothie.
Show me how to cook chicken curry.
Find an easy pasta recipe.

intents.name: restaurant_suggestions
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants recommendations for restaurants.
examples: Suggest a good sushi place nearby.
Where can I get the best burgers in town?
Find a vegan restaurant close to me.
Any good Italian restaurants around here?
Recommend a romantic dinner spot.

intents.name: cooking_instructions
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants step-by-step cooking instructions.
examples: How do I bake a cake?
Give me step-by-step instructions for making bread.
What's the best way to cook steak?
Teach me how to make homemade pizza.
How do I properly chop onions?

intents.name: ingredient_substitutions
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to substitute an ingredient.
examples: What can I use instead of butter?
Is there a substitute for eggs in baking?
What can I replace sugar with in this recipe?
Can I use almond milk instead of regular milk?
What's a good alternative to flour?

intents.name: food_nutrition
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to know nutritional information about food.
examples: How many calories are in a banana?
What's the protein content in chicken breast?
Is avocado good for weight loss?
How much sugar is in a can of soda?
Give me the nutritional breakdown of almonds.

examples: Give me a workout plan for weight loss.
How do I build muscle effectively?

intents.name: diet_advice

examples: What diet is best for losing weight?
Give me a high-protein meal plan.

intents.name: calorie_tracking
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to track their calorie intake.
examples: How many calories are in a bowl of oatmeal?
Track my daily calorie intake.
What’s the calorie count of this meal?
How many calories should I eat per day?
Compare the calories in rice and quinoa.

intents.name: mental_wellness
intents.description: Recognizes when the user is looking for advice on mental health and well-being.
examples: How can I manage stress better?
Give me some meditation techniques.
What are ways to improve sleep quality?

Tips for dealing with anxiety.

intents.name: hydration_tips
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants information on staying hydrated.
examples: How much water should I drink daily?
Is drinking cold water bad for digestion?
What are the benefits of staying hydrated?
How do I know if I’m dehydrated?
Give me tips on drinking more water.

examples: What is the stock price of Apple today?

examples: What is the exchange rate between USD and EUR?
Convert 100 dollars to yen.
How much is 500 pounds in Canadian dollars?
What’s the best time to exchange currency?
Show me the historical exchange rates for the past month.

intents.name: personal_finance
intents.description: Recognizes when the user seeks financial planning and budgeting advice.
examples: How do I create a monthly budget?
Give me tips on saving money.
What’s the best way to manage debt?
How much should I save for retirement?
What’s the 50/30/20 rule in budgeting?

intents.name: investment_advice
intents.description: Recognizes when the user is looking for investment strategies.
examples: What are the best investment options for beginners?
Is real estate a good investment?
How do I start investing in stocks?
What are the risks of cryptocurrency investments?
Give me tips on long-term investing.

intents.name: economic_trends
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants updates on economic trends and financial news.
examples: What’s the current inflation rate?
How is the job market performing this year?
What are the latest trends in global trade?
Give me a summary of today’s financial news.
What’s the impact of interest rate changes on the economy?

technology.description: Intents related to technology news, device troubleshooting, and gadget recommendations.

intents.name: tech_news
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants updates on the latest technology news.
examples: What are the latest trends in AI?
Tell me about the newest smartphone releases.
What’s happening in the tech industry this week?
Show me the latest advancements in quantum computing.

intents.description: Recognizes when the user needs help fixing a tech issue.
examples: My laptop won’t turn on, what should I do?
Why is my phone battery draining so fast?

examples: What’s the best smartphone under $500?
Recommend a good laptop for gaming.

intents.name: software_guidance
intents.description: Recognizes when the user needs help with software usage and installation.
examples: How do I install Windows 11?
What’s the best antivirus for my PC?
How do I use Photoshop for beginners?

intents.name: emerging_tech
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants insights on emerging technologies.
examples: Tell me about advancements in artificial intelligence.
What is the future of blockchain technology?
How does 5G impact daily life?

Explain the benefits of edge computing.

education.description: Intents related to acquiring knowledge, courses, study tips, and learning resources.

intents.name: course_recommendations
intents.description: Recognizes when the user is looking for educational courses or learning platforms.
examples: What are the best online courses for data science?

Where can I take a free machine learning course?
Suggest a good book for learning Python.
What are the best resources for self-learning AI?

intents.name: study_tips
intents.description: Recognizes when the user is looking for advice on effective studying techniques.
examples: How can I improve my concentration while studying?
What are the best ways to retain information?
Give me some tips for exam preparation.
How do I create an effective study schedule?
What’s the Pomodoro technique and how can it help me study?

intents.name: language_learning
intents.description: Recognizes when the user is looking for help with learning a new language.
examples: What’s the best way to learn Spanish quickly?
How can I improve my English vocabulary?
Suggest an app for learning French.
What are some common mistakes in learning German?
How do I practice pronunciation in Japanese?

intents.name: academic_questions
intents.description: Recognizes when the user is asking subject-specific academic questions.
examples: Can you explain Newton’s laws of motion?
What is the difference between mitosis and meiosis?
How does the Pythagorean theorem work?
Tell me about the causes of World War II.
Explain the concept of supply and demand.

intents.name: career_guidance
intents.description: Recognizes when the user needs advice on career choices and education paths.
examples: What skills do I need to become a data scientist?
Should I pursue a master's degree in AI?
What’s the best career path for a software developer?

intents.name: travel_recommendations

examples: What are the best places to visit in Europe?
Suggest a good vacation spot for families.
Where should I go for a tropical getaway?

Recommend a hidden gem for travelers.

intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants assistance with booking flights.
examples: Find me the cheapest flight to Paris.

Compare flight prices for New York next week.

intents.name: hotel_reservations
intents.description: Recognizes when the user is looking for accommodation options.
examples: Find me a budget hotel in San Francisco.

intents.name: local_attractions

examples: What are the must-visit places in Barcelona?

Are there any free attractions in Berlin?

intents.name: travel_tips

examples: How do I travel on a budget?
What are the essential travel items to pack?

What are the best travel apps for planning a trip?

smart.description: Intents related to smart home automation and IoT device control.

intents.name: smart_lighting
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to control smart lighting.
examples: Turn on the living room lights.
Dim the bedroom lights to 50%.
Set the kitchen lights to blue.
Turn off all the lights before I sleep.
Schedule the porch light to turn on at sunset.

intents.name: smart_thermostat
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to control a smart thermostat.
examples: Set the thermostat to 72 degrees.
Lower the temperature by 3 degrees.
Switch the AC to energy-saving mode.
Turn off the heating in the living room.
What’s the current temperature setting?

intents.name: security_system
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to manage home security settings.
examples: Arm the security system.
Disarm the alarm.
Lock the front door.
Is my garage door closed?
Show me the security camera feed.

intents.name: smart_appliances
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to control smart home appliances.
examples: Start the robot vacuum.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Turn on the coffee machine.
Stop the washing machine.
What’s the current status of my smart fridge?

intents.name: voice_assistant_controls
intents.description: Recognizes when the user wants to control the voice assistant itself.
examples: Increase the volume of the assistant.
Set my assistant to do not disturb mode.
Change the assistant’s voice.
What are my available voice commands?
Reset the assistant settings.

computer.description: Intents related to operating a computer, managing files, controlling applications, and system settings.

intents.name: file_management
intents.description: Recognizes commands related to managing files and folders.
examples: Open the downloads folder.
Delete file named 'report.pdf'.
Move 'notes.txt' to the Documents folder.
Rename 'image1.jpg' to 'vacation.jpg'.
Copy 'project.docx' to the desktop.

intents.name: application_control
intents.description: Recognizes commands for opening, closing, and switching applications.
examples: Open Google Chrome.
Close the calculator.
Switch to the next window.
Minimize all windows.
Launch Microsoft Word.

intents.name: system_settings
intents.description: Recognizes commands for adjusting system settings like brightness, volume, and connectivity.
examples: Increase screen brightness.
Turn on Wi-Fi.
Set volume to 50%.
Enable dark mode.
Change wallpaper to the default one.

intents.name: system_information
intents.description: Recognizes queries related to checking system performance and status.
examples: How much RAM is being used?
What’s my IP address?
Is my disk space running low?
Show CPU usage statistics.
Check battery percentage.

intents.name: task_automation
intents.description: Recognizes commands for automating tasks and scheduling system operations.
examples: Schedule a shutdown at 10 PM.
Create a backup of my files.
Run the disk cleanup tool.
Set an alarm for 7 AM.
Automatically clear cache every week.
